description:
My place is close to Cafe Amrita, Smoke Jazz & Supper Club, Henry's, Silver Moon Bakery, Cantina 1838, Central Park. You’ll love my place because of the comfy bed, the high ceilings, and the views. My place is good for couples and solo adventurers.

Trains B,C, 1, 2,3 are in two and three blocks form my place. there is a bike rental for riding in Central Park.  heart of Manhattan!

this is a furnished place and everything you need is here.  You can walk down to American Natural museum and cross the park for Met and Guggenheim.

I will greet the guests and give the keys and initial guidance. I will be there any time they need me.

upper west side  classy neighborhood

Trains B,C, 1, 2,3 are in two and three blocks form my place. there is a bike rental for riding in Central Park.  heart of Manhattan!
name: 1 Bedroom Appartment by Central Park
